Class SPenGestureLibrary

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.spen.lib.gesture.SPenGestureLibrary

extends java.lang.Object
    The main SPenGesture class.

    S-Pen SDK 2.3

      • recognizeSPenGesture

        public java.util.ArrayList<SPenGestureInfo> recognizeSPenGesture(PointF[][] iPoints)
        Recognizes a registered gesture.
        Parameters:
        iPoints - Gesture point data array
        Returns:
        Priority array of SPenGestureInfos
        Max 10 results
        No results return null
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.3

      • registerSPenGesture

        public boolean registerSPenGesture(java.lang.String iSPenGestureName,
                          PointF[][] iPoints)
        Register a gesture.
        Parameters:
        iSPenGestureName - Gesture name. Line breaks are not allowed ('\n'). The name must be on a single.
        iPoints - Gesture point data array
        iPoints[] = stroke,iPoints[][] = point
        Returns:
        True for success. False for failure.
        Since:
        S-Pen SDK 2.3
